statements.select:
with tb_report_indicator as ( select tb_report_video.id_product, tb_report_video.id_video, tb_report_video.str_video_title, case when tb_report_video.int_answer_percentage >= tb_report_video.int_video_min_correct_answer then 1 else 0 end as ind_win_prize, tb_report_video.int_video_min_correct_answer, tb_report_video.int_answer_percentage, tb_report_video.dec_prize from ( select v.id_product id_product, v.id as id_video, v.str_title as str_video_title, v.int_min_correct_answer int_video_min_correct_answer, case when prize.int_answered_questions_count > 0 then convert(integer, 100 * (prize.int_correct_answered_questions_count / convert(decimal(16,2),prize.int_answered_questions_count))) else 0 end as int_answer_percentage, prize.dec_prize from tb_product_quiz_usermobile_prize prize inner join tb_product_video v on v.id = prize.id_product_video inner join tb_product p on p.id = v.id_product left join tb_product_permission pp on pp.id_product = p.id where ind_view is not null
p.id_menu_category = #MenuCategoryId#
pp.str_channel_id = #PermissionId#
convert(date, prize.dt_view) >= convert(date, #DtBegin#)
convert(date, prize.dt_view) <= convert(date, #DtEnd#)
) as tb_report_video ) select * from ( select row_number() over ( order by RowConstrainedResult.int_video_count ) as RowNum, * from ( select (select count(*) from (select id_video from tb_report_indicator group by id_video) tb_total_video) int_video_count, (select count(*) from tb_report_indicator where tb_report_indicator.ind_win_prize = 1) int_win_count, (select count(*) from tb_report_indicator where tb_report_indicator.ind_win_prize = 0) int_lost_count, (select sum(tb_report_indicator.dec_prize) from tb_report_indicator) dec_prize_count ) AS RowConstrainedResult ) as tb_final where tb_final.RowNum > #PageStart# AND tb_final.RowNum <= #PageEnd# order by tb_final.RowNum

with tb_report_indicator as ( select tb_report_video.id_product, tb_report_video.id_video, tb_report_video.str_video_title, case when tb_report_video.int_answer_percentage >= tb_report_video.int_video_min_correct_answer then 1 else 0 end as ind_win_prize, tb_report_video.int_video_min_correct_answer, tb_report_video.int_answer_percentage, tb_report_video.dec_prize from ( select v.id_product id_product, v.id as id_video, v.str_title as str_video_title, v.int_min_correct_answer int_video_min_correct_answer, case when prize.int_answered_questions_count > 0 then convert(integer, 100 * (prize.int_correct_answered_questions_count / convert(decimal(16,2),prize.int_answered_questions_count))) else 0 end as int_answer_percentage, prize.dec_prize from tb_product_quiz_usermobile_prize prize inner join tb_product_video v on v.id = prize.id_product_video inner join tb_product p on p.id = v.id_product left join tb_product_permission pp on pp.id_product = p.id where ind_view is not null
p.id_menu_category = #MenuCategoryId#
pp.str_channel_id = #PermissionId#
convert(date, prize.dt_view) >= convert(date, #DtBegin#)
convert(date, prize.dt_view) <= convert(date, #DtEnd#)
) as tb_report_video )
select count(*) from ( select (select count(*) from (select id_video from tb_report_indicator group by id_video) tb_total_video) int_video_count, (select count(*) from tb_report_indicator where tb_report_indicator.ind_win_prize = 1) int_win_count, (select count(*) from tb_report_indicator where tb_report_indicator.ind_win_prize = 0) int_lost_count, (select sum(tb_report_indicator.dec_prize) from tb_report_indicator) dec_prize_count ) AS RowConstrainedResult

select * from ( select row_number() over ( order by tb_report_video.dt_view desc) as RowNum, tb_report_video.id_usermobile, tb_report_video.str_usermobile_name str_usermobile_name, tb_report_video.str_usermobile_name str_usermobile_email, tb_report_video.id_product, tb_report_video.id_video id_video, tb_report_video.str_video_title str_video_title, tb_report_video.dt_view dt_view, tb_report_video.int_correct_answer int_answer_correct_count, tb_report_video.int_wrong_answer int_answer_wrong_count, tb_report_video.int_video_min_correct_answer, tb_report_video.int_answer_percentage from ( select distinct um.id id_usermobile, um.str_name str_usermobile_name, um.str_email str_usermobile_email, um.str_participant_id str_usermobile_participant_id, v.id_product id_product, v.id as id_video, v.str_title as str_video_title, v.int_min_correct_answer int_video_min_correct_answer, case when prize.int_answered_questions_count > 0 then convert(integer, 100 * (prize.int_correct_answered_questions_count / convert(decimal(16,2),prize.int_answered_questions_count))) else 0 end as int_answer_percentage, prize.dec_prize, prize.dt_view, prize.int_correct_answered_questions_count as int_correct_answer, (prize.int_answered_questions_count - prize.int_correct_answered_questions_count) as int_wrong_answer from tb_product_quiz_usermobile_prize prize inner join tb_product_video v on v.id = prize.id_product_video inner join tb_user_mobile um on um.id = prize.id_usermobile inner join tb_product p on p.id = v.id_product left join tb_product_permission pp on pp.id_product = p.id where ind_view is not null
p.id_menu_category = #MenuCategoryId#
pp.str_channel_id = #PermissionId#
convert(date, prize.dt_view) >= convert(date, #DtBegin#)
convert(date, prize.dt_view) <= convert(date, #DtEnd#)
) as tb_report_video ) AS RowConstrainedResult where RowConstrainedResult.RowNum > #PageStart# AND RowConstrainedResult.RowNum <= #PageEnd# order by RowConstrainedResult.RowNum

select count(*) from ( select distinct um.str_name str_usermobile_name, um.str_email str_usermobile_email, um.str_participant_id str_usermobile_participant_id, v.id_product id_product, v.id as id_video, v.str_title as str_video_title, v.int_min_correct_answer int_video_min_correct_answer, case when prize.int_answered_questions_count > 0 then convert(integer, 100 * (prize.int_correct_answered_questions_count / convert(decimal(16,2),prize.int_answered_questions_count))) else 0 end as int_answer_percentage, prize.dec_prize, prize.dt_view, prize.int_correct_answered_questions_count as int_correct_answer, (prize.int_answered_questions_count - prize.int_correct_answered_questions_count) as int_wrong_answer from tb_product_quiz_usermobile_prize prize inner join tb_product_video v on v.id = prize.id_product_video inner join tb_user_mobile um on um.id = prize.id_usermobile inner join tb_product p on p.id = v.id_product left join tb_product_permission pp on pp.id_product = p.id where ind_view is not null
p.id_menu_category = #MenuCategoryId#
pp.str_channel_id = #PermissionId#
convert(date, prize.dt_view) >= convert(date, #DtBegin#)
convert(date, prize.dt_view) <= convert(date, #DtEnd#)
) as tb_report_video

select str_usermobile_name, str_usermobile_email, str_usermobile_participant_id, str_product_name, str_video_title, str_quiz_title, str_usermobile_answer, ind_answer_correct, dt_answer from (
select row_number() over ( order by a.dt_insert desc) as RowNum, um.str_name str_usermobile_name, um.str_email str_usermobile_email, um.str_participant_id str_usermobile_participant_id, p.str_name str_product_name, v.str_title str_video_title, a.str_product_quiz str_quiz_title, a.str_product_quiz_item str_usermobile_answer, a.ind_answer_correct ind_answer_correct, a.dt_insert dt_answer from tb_product_quiz_usermobile_answer a inner join tb_user_mobile um on um.id = a.id_usermobile inner join tb_product_video v on v.id = a.id_product_video inner join tb_product p on p.id = v.id_product where 1 = 1
um.id = #UserMobileId#
um.str_name LIKE '%$UserMobileName$%'
p.id = #ProductId#
v.id = #VideoId#
a.id_product_quiz = #QuizId#
) AS RowConstrainedResult where RowConstrainedResult.RowNum > #PageStart# AND RowConstrainedResult.RowNum <= #PageEnd# order by RowConstrainedResult.RowNum

select count(*) from (
select row_number() over ( order by a.dt_insert desc) as RowNum, um.str_name str_usermobile_name, um.str_email str_usermobile_email, um.str_participant_id str_usermobile_participant_id, p.str_name str_product_name, v.str_title str_video_title, a.str_product_quiz str_quiz_title, a.str_product_quiz_item str_usermobile_answer, a.ind_answer_correct ind_answer_correct, a.dt_insert dt_answer from tb_product_quiz_usermobile_answer a inner join tb_user_mobile um on um.id = a.id_usermobile inner join tb_product_video v on v.id = a.id_product_video inner join tb_product p on p.id = v.id_product where 1 = 1
um.id = #UserMobileId#
um.str_name LIKE '%$UserMobileName$%'
p.id = #ProductId#
v.id = #VideoId#
a.id_product_quiz = #QuizId#
) AS RowConstrainedResult

select str_usermobile_name, str_usermobile_email, str_usermobile_participant_id, str_product_name, str_quiz_title, str_usermobile_answer, ind_answer_correct, dt_answer from ( select row_number() over ( order by p.dt_view desc) as RowNum, um.str_name str_usermobile_name, um.str_email str_usermobile_email, um.str_participant_id str_usermobile_participant_id, p.dt_view dt_usermobile_video_view, prod.str_name str_product_name , v.str_title str_video_title, v.id id_video, p.int_correct_answered_questions_count int_usermobile_answer_correct, p.int_answered_questions_count - p.int_correct_answered_questions_count as int_usermobile_answer_wrong, p.dec_prize dec_usermobile_video_prize from tb_product_quiz_usermobile_prize p inner join tb_user_mobile um on um.id = p.id_usermobile inner join tb_product_video v on v.id = p.id_product_video inner join tb_product prod on prod.id = v.id_product where p.dt_view is not null
um.str_name LIKE '%$UserMobileName$%'
prod.id = #ProductId#
v.id = #VideoId#
) AS RowConstrainedResult where RowConstrainedResult.RowNum > #PageStart# AND RowConstrainedResult.RowNum <= #PageEnd# order by RowConstrainedResult.RowNum

select count(*) from ( select row_number() over ( order by p.dt_view desc) as RowNum, um.str_name str_usermobile_name, um.str_email str_usermobile_email, um.str_participant_id str_usermobile_participant_id, p.dt_view dt_usermobile_video_view, prod.str_name str_product_name , v.str_title str_video_title, v.id id_video, p.int_correct_answered_questions_count int_usermobile_answer_correct, p.int_answered_questions_count - p.int_correct_answered_questions_count as int_usermobile_answer_wrong, p.dec_prize dec_usermobile_video_prize from tb_product_quiz_usermobile_prize p inner join tb_user_mobile um on um.id = p.id_usermobile inner join tb_product_video v on v.id = p.id_product_video inner join tb_product prod on prod.id = v.id_product where p.dt_view is not null
um.str_name LIKE '%$UserMobileName$%'
prod.id = #ProductId#
v.id = #VideoId#
) AS RowConstrainedResult
